htmltree-stringify
==================

syntax tree ([htmltree](https://github.com/defunctzombie/node-htmltree)) -> xml/html

```bash
$ npm i --save htmltree-stringify
```

```javascript
htmltree('<html><body onclick=foo></body></html>', function (err, doc) {
  var html = stringify(doc);
  console.log(html);
});
```
